price: 你说：“除安拉外，在天地间的，不知幽玄，他们不知道什么时候复活。
arabic: قُل لَّا يَعۡلَمُ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yaʿlamu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi al-ghayba illā al-lahu wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
